attributes.action: look again at the 1955 Ruth Ellis case in light of new evidence that the Old Bailey in 1955 never got to hear.Evidence that shows Ruth Ellis was innocent of the crime for which she was hanged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A body of evidence has been uncovered that the jury at the 1955 trial never got to hear.Evidence showing that Ruth Ellis was a victim of a gross miscarriage of justice.The true sequence of events surrounding the case fifty years ago were witheld.The Prime Minister should look again at the Ruth Ellis case so justice for Ruth and her family can finally be served.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "look again at the 1955 Ruth Ellis case in light of new evidence that the Old Bailey in 1955 never got to hear.Evidence that shows Ruth Ellis was innocent of the crime for which she was hanged."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page16559

Prime Minister's Office
